Item 1: Your attention, please. In order for planned repairs and maintenance to take place, the company recreation center will be closed this Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. During this time, the pool will be cleaned and the front doors will be replaced. Next week, the center will reopen at its regular time.

On tonight’s weather report, we’ll tell you what to expect for the upcoming weekend. Through Saturday afternoon, it will continue to be hot, humid, and overcast. But then, big changes are coming. So whether you are staying in the city or taking a trip to the beach, you won’t want to miss this report.
Item 3: Imagine that a U.S. marketing firm is doing research in your country. You have agreed to participate in a telephone interview about listening to music.Question 5: How often do you listen to music, and where do you usually listen to it?Question 6: Do you listen to music more or less now than you did in the past? Why?Question 7: What is the best way to find out about new music? Why?Talking to friends or familyReading music reviewsListening to the radio

Item 5: Express an opinion What is the best way to get trained for a job? Choose ONE of the options provided below and give reasons or examples to support your opinion.By reading training manualsBy watching training videosBy taking a class taught by an instructor
